Articles.Content:
Ill be quick. 1) 552 parts ssto, not finished yet,l it was almost playable before mod installation (all near future + interestellar) but now it will just hold yellow in the warp bar.

2) I have an i59600k, 32gb of ram at 3200 and one rx570. game seems to work around 8 gb when flying the thing.

3)Already in lowest graphics and did the physiscs thing.

So, its there any updated mod capable of improve this? very thnx anyways if its not the case.
